name: Breakthrough Technologies

description:
Breakthrough is a product incubation group specializing in the development of high-performance software and Internet services.
Our business model is to collaborate with both entrepreneurs and industry leaders to develop innovative software, scalable web solutions, and disruptive SaaS offerings, and bring those solutions to market at scale.
Breakthrough has a portfolio of existing intellectual property covering a diversity of web, desktop, and mobile applications, and where complementary, customizes and licenses them to accelerate the delivery of new solutions to market.Â  Our products are deployed in thousands of customer locations internationally.
Breakthrough's digital agency, Mad Union, focuses on foundational web solutions such as CMS-powered sites, Shopify-powered stores, and mobile applications.
